communication.title: 18% of pinch texts are fabric-only (94/510)
communication.expected: Pinch should mention hemline, silhouette, proportion  not just fabric

examples.pinch: the cut works with your frame  it follows without clinging.  the key is the fabric in person  make sure it holds its shape on your frame.
